title: Amazon | SDE 3 | Backend
content:
Education: Tier-2 College(TN) 
Years of Experience: 10.5 
Prior Experience: Microsoft
Date of the Offer: DEC 2023
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE3/L6
Location: India
Salary: 95L INR
Relocation: 5L INR
Signing Bonus: 85L INR 1st year and 70L INR 2nd year
Stock bonus: Not disclosing :P
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1.8cr - 1.9cr
